name: Vistani Passkey
flavorText: With a sprinkle of residuum, you make a common tool or key particularly potent for the current situation.
text: You examine a lock or trap as part of the ritual and sprinkle residuum on the focus (see below). After enacting this ritual, you can use the focus to make a Thievery check with a +5 bonus on the lock or trap you examined. Even if you fail by 5 or more, you cannot set off a trap with a check augmented by the bonus from this ritual. Focus: An ornate key or thievesâ€™ tool worth 100 gp.
componentCost: 100 gp, plus a focus worth 100 gp
